alert.note: Alert for Butler; Muhlenberg; Ohio (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 9:31PM EST until February 21 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Green River at Rochester affecting Ohio, Butler and Muhlenberg Counties. Green River at Woodbury affecting Butler and Warren Counties. .Heavy rain from Wednesday night and Thursday is causing the river to rise. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Green River at Rochester. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 34.0 feet, Rochester Ferry stops operation. At 37.0 feet, Reeds and Rochester Ferries remain closed. KY 369 floods one mile north of Rochester. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Saturday the stage was 37.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.8 feet just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 37.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index. php?wfo=lmk Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued Sunday morning.
